2025-08-20.content: You can use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for some Backup for GKE resources. For more information, see [Manage Backup for GKE resources using custom constraints](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/add-on/backup-for-gke/how-to/create-custom-constraints). This feature is generally available ([GA](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)).

summary.title: New Feature: Granular Control for Backup for GKE
summary.summary: Custom constraints for Backup for GKE resources.

2025-07-01.content: Backup for GKE now supports backing up and restoring Hyperdisk ML and Hyperdisk Balanced High Availability volumes. This feature is available for GKE clusters running version 1.33.1-gke.1959000 and later.

summary.title: Backup for GKE adds Hyperdisk support
summary.summary: Backup for GKE now supports backing up and restoring Hyperdisk ML and Hyperdisk Balanced High Availability volumes for GKE clusters running version 1.33.1-gke.1959000 and later.
